oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Governor Cox Day in Bristol
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of a crowd of people gathered on State Street in Bristol for Governor Cox Day. On the front in the bottom left corner is text that reads "Bunting & Son / Briston, Va. Tenn.," referring to Bunting & Son drugstore located in Bristol. Features a handwritten note on front. Note: the picture occupies the top half of card only.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Streets; People; Utility poles; Stores & shops; Commemorations
